name: Spooky Circus
description:
All code and pixel-art were made by 15 y.o. solo-developer for Black and White Jam! Enjoy!

You play as a clown who got into a very creepy circus! Your task is to collect all 12 clown noses to win!

The game has 5 levels. To pass to the next level, you need to reach the end of the current level.

Controls:

A or Left Arrow - go left

D or Right Arrow - go right

W or Up Arrow - jump
